description.narrative: From January 2014 to June 2016, UNICEF with its implementing partners reached 1,036,232 people mainly affected by the conflict and cholera and vulnerable host communities with safe water supply; 486,242 people with safe sanitation and 985,194 people with hygiene promotion messages. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2015
